content: Similarly, you can use the Wandering Wight’s Spirit Attack to quickly stagger Jinchi, which is great for breaking him out of otherwise dangerous moves - provided you do so before the attack lands since it can still hurt your health bar.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Jinchi.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Jinchi', specifically from the subsection 'Elder Jinchi Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Similarly, you can use the Wandering Wight’s Spirit Attack to quickly stagger Jinchi, which is great for breaking him out of otherwise dangerous moves - provided you do so before the attack lands since it can still hurt your health bar.
